title: MyD88 dependent cascade initiated on endosome
description: Upon binding of their ligands, TLR7/8 and TLR9 recruit a cytoplasmic adaptor MyD88 and IRAKs, downstream of which the signaling pathways are divided to induce either inflammatory cytokines or type I IFNs.  View original pathway at [http://www.reactome.org/PathwayBrowser/#DIAGRAM=975155 Reactome].
